p: Carrageenan (Sigma Chemicals Co., St Louis, USA), formalin (Taflen Industry, Ethiopia), normal saline (H. R. Leuven, Belgium), distilled water (Ethiopian Pharmaceutical Manufacturing Factory, Ethiopia), absolute methanol (Indenta chemicals, India) and glacial acetic acid (Sigma-Aldrich laborchemikalien, Germany), indomethacin (Cadila pharmaceuticals Ethiopia), aspirin, diclofenac and morphine (Ethiopian Pharmaceutical Manufacturing Factory, Ethiopia) obtained from the respective vendors were used in the experiment.
